import React from 'react'; import groom from '../images/rajeshm.jpeg'; import bride from '../images/somam.jpeg'; import brideback from '../images/brideback.jpg'; const Invitation = () => { return (

Hello!

We invite you to be with us as we celebrate our new life together

Rajesh Mandal

S/O Kanailal Mandal
Usharani Mandal

Soma Mandal (Sathi)

D/O Harekrishna Mandal
Shibani Mandal
); } export default Invitation;
